steps.description: Extract the stock price from the search results using convert_webpage_url_into_markdown to get clean content and then extract.

tool_arguments.code:
url1 = "https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/ATHERENERG.NS/"
url2 = "https://www.nseindia.com/get-quotes/equity?symbol=ATHERENERG"
url3 = "https://www.tradingview.com/symbols/NSE-ATHERENERG/"

content1 = convert_webpage_url_into_markdown(url1)
content2 = convert_webpage_url_into_markdown(url2)
content3 = convert_webpage_url_into_markdown(url3)
result = f"Content from Yahoo Finance: {content1}\nContent from NSE India: {content2}\nContent from TradingView: {content3}"
return result

execution_result.result:

Ather Energy Ltd. engages in the development, design, manufacture, assembly, and sale of electronic vehicles and other related products and services. It operates through the India and Other Countries geographical segments. Its products include Ather Rizta, 450 Apex, 450X, 450S, Book Rizta, and Book 450. The company was founded by Tarun Sanjay Mehta and Swapnil Babanlal Jain on October 21, 2013 and is headquartered in Bangalore, India.
